sp. nov. 23. Lateral view. 24. Dorsal view. — An = anal tube, Py = pygofer, G = gonostylus. Photographs by Y. Laurent & I. Bachy.

Belbina lambertoni .

B. nympha

subSubSection.paragraph:
MADAGASCAR : 1 ♂ , 1 ♀ , E Madagascar, Massif du Marojejy (rés. nat. intégr. 12), 1300 m , 2–8 Dec. 1972 , A. Peyrieras, 14°26’ S , 49°44’ E ( MNHN ); 1 ♂ , same data, 4 Dec. 1972 ( RBINS ); 1 ♀ , same data, 12 Dec. 1972 ( RBINS ); 1 ♀ , Fianarantsoa province , Parc National Ranomafana, Belle Vue et Talatakely, 21°15.99’ S 47°25.21’ E , 1020 m , 21–28 Jan. 2002 , Malaise trap, secondary forest, R. Harin’Hala ( CAS ); 1 ♂ , Moramanga region, Andaside, PL hôtel, 18°56.820’ S , 48°25.155’ E ,
22 Nov. 2005
, 930 m, Bourgoin, Ouvrard, Attié, Soulier-Perkins ( MNHN ); 1 ♀ , no data ( FSAG ); 1 ♀ , Antananarivo province , 46 km NE of Ankazobe, Ambohitantely, 18°11.88’ S , 47°16.89’ E , Malaise trap in sclerophyl forest, 700 m , 16–27 Jan. 2005 , Irvin & Harin’Hala ( CAS ); 1 ♂ , route d’Anosibe, 11 Nov. 1961 ( MHNL ).

Belbina pionneaui .

B. servillei

Figs 36–42.
Belbina in natura
. — 36 .
B. bergrothi .
Vohimana, 4 Jan 2006, photograph by N. Cliquennois. — 37–38 .

, ♂, Berenty, 15 Nov. 2008, photograph by J. Cryan. — 40–42 .
B. recurva
. 40. Marojejy, Cascade Humbert, 22 Nov. 2005, photograph by D. C. Lees. 41. Anajanaharibe Sud, 2 May 2010, photograph by B. Rowe. 42. Masoala Peninsula, 30 May 2009, photograph by D. Fenolio (© 2011 Danté Fenolio/www.anotheca.com, with permission).

subSubSection.paragraph: MADAGASCAR : 1 specimen , Vohimana, 4 Jan. 2006 , 13:35, Nicolas Cliquennois ( Fig. 36 ), 18°55’ S , 48°30’ E .
Male genitalia without basodorsal process on gonostyli.

Belbina bergrothi
can be separated (1) from
B. recurva
by not having the margins of the anal tube produced into a semi-circular lateral plate; (2) from
B. madagascariensis
and
B. nympha
by having the gonostyli acutely rounded apically and more elongate; (3) from
B. foliacea
by not having the gonostyli angulose above mediodorsal tooth.
